bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Dr. Klaus Kirchner, a collector of propaganda, is based in Erlangen, Germany. Kirchner created a comprehensively illustrated set of reference books on World War II leaflets, flyers, pamphlets, and broadsides which was published from 1972 to 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The material in this collection is from Klaus Kirchner's "Soviet Central Series." It consists of World War II Soviet propaganda broadsides, leaflets, and flyers aimed at German troops and the German population. Kirchner wrote the following as an explanatory note for the collection: "The Soviet Government started to produce and disseminate aerial propaganda leaflets for Germans on June 22, 1941, the day the German Wehrmacht invaded Russia. The leaflet campaign of the 'Soviet Central Series' continued to the very last day of World War II, May 8, 1945."

All propaganda pamphlets are numbered; the pamphlet number is placed prominently at the beginning of each entry. Materials are organized by the same numerical system Kircher used in his published works. Only those numbers listed are found in the collection.

Kirchner's organizational system, translations, text selection, and notes have retained his original description. A key to the item descriptions, including number, first words printed, date, size, preservation grade, means of distribution, and description/translation, begins the container list.

Many of the items are listed or illustrated in Kirchner's books. For more details and reproductions of some "Soviet Central Series" leaflets, see Kirchner's Flugblätter aus der UdSSR, Juni-August 1941 (vol. 8), Flugblätter aus der UdSSR, September-Dezember 1941 (vol. 9), and Flugblätter aus der UdSSR: Gesamtverzeichnis der strategischen Serie: Bibliographie (vol. 14).

did.unittitle: Soviet Central Series

scopecontent.p: The following item list was created by Klaus Kirchner.

Key to Kirchner's item description:
Leaflet code - First words of leaflet text - size in cm - number of printed pages - preservation grade - month, year of first dissemination - means of dissemination by airplane, balloon, rocket, or artillery shell if required - description: [translation], image description

Preservation grades:
1 - Leaflet as printed and folded by producer
2 - Leaflet slightly worn
3 - Leaflet shows some damage
4 - Fragment of leaflet

did.unittitle: Rundfunkrede... Stalin am 3. Juli 1941...

scopecontent.p: 10x13 cm - 16 - preservation: 1, crinkling by artillery dissemination. Description: [J. W Stalin, the Soviet leader was so stunned by Hitler's invasion, it took him almost two weeks to recover from the shock that Hitler had betrayed him and to inform the Russian population that he would fight the German Wehrmacht. For the first and last time he addressed his people as brothers and sisters...]

did.unittitle: Deutscher Soldat! Jetzt hast Du uns kennengelernt. Wir haben uns tapfer...

scopecontent.p: 13x19 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. description: [German soldier! Now you have met us! We fought courageously. Let us talk honestly from man to man, without reservations. You are a German, I am a Russian...].

did.unittitle: GENUG MIT DEM BLINDEN VERTRAUEN! Man sagt uns, der Soldat...

scopecontent.p: 13x19 cm - 1 - preservation: 1. Description: [Enough of unconditional trust! They tell us a soldier does not have to think... Down with Hitler. A group of German soldiers].

did.unittitle: SOLDAT DER DEUTSCHEN ARMEE! DU SOLLST DIE WAHRHEIT...

scopecontent.p: 12x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Soldier of the German Army! You should know the truth! At a conquered command post of a German regiment the Red Army had seized letters of German soldiers...]

did.unittitle: GEHT MIT DIESEM PASSIERSCHEIN...

scopecontent.p: 15xl0 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: the two-language safe conduct without additional text was disseminated in 1941.

did.unittitle: Nachrichten von der Front (Nr. 16) LUFTANGRIFF VON SOWJETFLUGZEUGEN AUF BERLIN...

scopecontent.p: 13x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [... Soviet airplanes are attacking Berlin... German-Fascist airplanes are bombarding positions of German troops... The German Command is afraid of soldiers' letters...].

did.unittitle: Siegfried Witte,...

scopecontent.p: 1xl0 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Sergeant Siegfried Witte is writing a letter to his wife Emmi from Russian captivity…] Photograph: we see a German lance corporal (Gefreiter) writing a letter, but the leaflet describes the German soldier as a sergeant. As a result of mistakes like these the credibility of Soviet leaflets in general was damaged.

did.unittitle: Deutscher Soldat! Während Du jeden Augenblick in...

scopecontent.p: 15x12 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [... While you are in danger of being killed any moment your wife and children are waiting for you at home...]. Photograph: A wife and two children are waiting.

did.unittitle: Das ist die wahre Menschlichkeit…

scopecontent.p: 14x23 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [This is the true human love of Soviet Russia... Come on over to the side of the Red Army...] Photograph: A Russian nurse is taking good care of a German prisoner of war. Note: the retouched moustache of the German prisoner. All German prisoners of war had been shaved of all body hair. On the reverse, not shown here, a letter is reproduced of the German soldier depicted here. He had written home to his parents and his sister. Note: there was no postal service between USSR and Germany during World War II.

did.unittitle: Nachrichten von der Front Nr. 26

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [... The Red Army has taken Jelna. ..Booty of the Red Army... The attacks of the Red Army will be continued... The 29th German motorized Division has been destroyed...].

did.unittitle: Auslands-Nachrichten (Nr. 28) [News from Foreign Countries (No. 28)]

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [... The Italian people demand the end of the war and the Germans to be driven out of Italy. ..]

did.unittitle: Was geht in Deutschland vor? Nr. 17 [What is happening in Germany? No. 17]

scopecontent.p: 13x16 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [... Hitler is leading Germany to a catastrophe... German women are demanding an end to the war... Pamphlets against the war... Executions and arrests... German soldiers! Join the voice of your people! Make an end to this senseless and bloody war.]

did.unittitle: MACHT SCHLUSS MIT DEM KRIEG!...

scopecontent.p: 10x14 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Make an end to this war! Come over to the side of the Red Army! Comrades of the 18th Tank Division! I am now in captivity. My life is safe. I am being treated well. You all have the same wish as I: we want to make an end to this war. It is a shame for us German soldiers to make war against the workers and the peasants of Soviet Russia...]. On reverse, the Soviet standard two language safe conduct is reproduced.

did.unittitle: AN DIE DEUTSCHEN OFFIZIERE Von ihren in russischer Kriegsgefangenschaft...

scopecontent.p: 15x21 cm - 4 - blue, yellow - preservation: 1. Description: [To the German officers. From their comrades in Russian captivity... Do everything you can which will bring Germany out of this hopeless war. The German Wehrmacht can only serve Germany but not the Nazis and the Gestapo...]. Eleven photographs: German officers, facsimiles of their declaration and their signatures.

did.unittitle: Nachrichten von der Front Nr. 33...

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper "News from the Front": […Attacks of the Soviet Air Force... Russian and English airplanes are fighting together... Typhoid epidemic in the German Army...].

did.unittitle: Seht Euch diese Manner an: Was sagen ihre Gesichter?...

scopecontent.p: 15x22 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1. Description: [Look at these men - What do their faces tell? Irreconcilable hate against the enemy and invincible will for victory is visible... Russian partisans are the faithful sons of the freedom loving Russian people, they are heroes and avengers. Be aware of their hate and bullets. Partisans are everywhere and you cannot attack them...]

did.unittitle: AN DIE JUGEND DER GANZEN WELT!...

scopecontent.p: 14x21 cm - 4 - preservation: 1. Description: [To the youth of the whole world! On September 28, 1941 an antifascist rally was held in Moscow...]. A German communist, Hans Mahle, was among the delegates.

did.unittitle: Fragen und Antworten, die jetzt aktuell...

scopecontent.p: 13x18 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Questions and answers. Why Soviet Russia has concluded an agreement with England against Hitler-Germany? Because everybody takes all the help he can get from his neighbor if he is attacked by an enemy... It would have been stupid not to accept this help... England and Soviet Russia have a common enemy - Hitler...].

did.unittitle: DIE WAHRHEIT über SOWJETRUSSLAND. Die Lügen des "Angriff" haben...

scopecontent.p: 15x23 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1, two punch holes at the edge, no loss of text. Description: [The truth about Soviet Russia. The lies of the "Angriff" have short legs. After the unfaithful attack of Hitler on the Soviet Union the Nazi press is trying to defame the Soviet country; the mighty friend of the German people... Hands off from the mighty socialist state of workers and peasants...]

did.unittitle: Ehrliche Worte eines jungen Deutschen...

scopecontent.p: 14x18 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes. Description: [Honest words of a young German... On this rally, a young antifascist, Hans Mahle, from Hamburg said: "I, a young worker from Hamburg, I am speaking to you, German boys and girls... The Nazi murderers tell you, the German youth was born to die on the battle fields. Cynically Hitler declared he will not hesitate for one moment to sacrifice millions of Germans to reach this goal...]

did.unittitle: Was geht in Deutschland vor? Nr. 24

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [What is happening in Germany? No. 24... German soldier! Listen to the voice of your people, they are extremely fed up with this war... At first the bombs burst and then the air-raid-alarm was sounded...].

did.unittitle: Bestimmungen über Kriegsgefangene in der Sowjetunion...

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Orders on the treatment of (German) prisoners of war... July 1, 1941... It is forbidden: a) to insult or mistreat prisoners of war...].

did.unittitle: Was geht in Deutschland vor? Nr. 24

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description of newspaper [What is happening in Germany No.24... German newspapers admit that the "Blitzkrieg" failed... Hungry Germans refuse to say "Heil Hitler" ... German pilots refuse to fly... In Germany an uprising is expected...].

did.unittitle: Was geht in Deutschland vor? [Nr. 25]

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description of leaflet newspaper: [What is happening in Germany? No. 25... German newspapers report the failure of the "Blitzkrieg"... German pilots refuse to fly their airplanes... An uprising of the German population is expected... Machine guns are deployed on all street crossings in Berlin, Munich and other major cities...]

did.unittitle: Auslands-Nachrichten Nr. 36

scopecontent.p: 12x18 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [News from Foreign Countries No. 36... The Moscow conference of the major powers of the anti-Hitler coalition... As a result of this conference America and England will supply the Soviet Union with substantial amounts of weapons...]

did.unittitle: Was geht in Deutschland vor? Nr. 26

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description of leaflet newspaper: [What is happening in Germany? No. 26... German soldier! The situation at home is getting worse, hunger is cropping up, the need growing... Substantial discontent in Cologne... Unrest in Essen... Censorship is delaying soldiers mail... The ghost of Napoleon is frightening Hitler...]

did.unittitle: Auslands-Nachrichten Nr. 37.

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description of leaflet newspaper: [News from Foreign Countries No. 37... The USA are welcoming the results of the Moscow conference... The USA and England will practically fulfill any Russian demand...]

did.unittitle: Nachrichten von der Front Nr. 36

scopecontent.p: 14x17 cm - 4 - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [News from the Front No. 36... They don't want to continue...Hitler cannot supply his soldiers with trousers...And the war has just begun. How shall it end?... This is documented by the following illustration...]. Translation of reproduced document: [... Authentication! Soldier first class Weiss is allowed to use Russian uniform trousers because his trousers cannot be used anymore and his unit cannot supply him with new trousers...]

did.unittitle: HITLER BELÜGT DAS DEUTSCHE VOLK. DEUTSCHER SOLDAT!...

scopecontent.p: 13x19 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Hitler is lying to the German people. German soldier! The leader of the Soviet Information Agency A.S. Schterbakow is telling the truth. On October 3, Hitler spoke on the radio... The enormous losses of the Fascist German army on the East Front are causing severe unrest and discontent...]

did.unittitle: Nachrichten von der Front Nr. 37

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [News from the Front No. 37... U-boat "U-570" reached an English port. The German U-boat "U-570" was seized in the Atlantic and was taken to an English port on October 3...]

did.unittitle: Was geht in Deutschland vor? Nr. 28

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [... You will never see (Leningrad)... Germany is ruled by plutocrats... Down with the inhuman Hitler! Make an end to this war. Surrender to the Red Army!]

did.unittitle: Auslands-Nachrichten Nr. 38

scopecontent.p: 13x17 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [... English tanks for Soviet Russia...The USA has an arsenal of weapons for the anti-Hitler block.. America is ensuring victory over Hitler in the battle for the Atlantic...]

did.unittitle: Eine neue Offensive - neue Berge von Leichen Deutsche...

scopecontent.p: 14x21 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [A new offensive - new mountains of dead... At the beginning of the new offensive at the East Front Hitler sent you an address. Hitler is lying to you in order to drive you to a new disaster... Refuse the order to attack! Make an end to this war!].

did.unittitle: Schuss mit den sinnlosen Opfern! Deutsche Soldaten!...

scopecontent.p: 14x21 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes - 10.1941- description: [In his speech on 2nd October Hitler repeated his lie that he attacked Russia because the Red Army had prepared the war against Germany... Make an end to the senseless sacrifices... Hitler will kill millions of German soldiers on the battle fields but he will not gain the rule of the world...]

did.unittitle: Vier Verwundete deutsche Soldaten...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Four wounded German soldiers... Your officers have told you the Russians kill German prisoners and wounded... The Red Army is adhering strictly to the rules of war: No revenge is taken on prisoners! No fighting against those without weapons!...]. On reverse, a facsimile of the announcement made by the four prisoners is reproduced.

did.unittitle: Briefwechsel zwischen dem Präsidenten der Vereinigten Staaten von Amerika

scopecontent.p: 15x23 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Exchange of letters between President Roosevelt and Comrade Stalin... I have given my agreement to send all armament (necessary). Order has been given to start delivery immediately...].

did.unittitle: Deutscher Soldat! Auch Dich wird die Kugel treffen!...

scopecontent.p: 13x22 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [German soldier! You also will be hit by a bullet! Hitler is driving you into another offensive. And again he tells you: "Only one last, the very last effort - and the war will be over!"... Until this offensive the German Army has already lost 4,500,000 soldiers, dead, wounded and prisoners...]

did.unittitle: HITLER IST DER FEIND...

scopecontent.p: 16x25 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [Hitler is the enemy of the German people. German soldiers! You are waging war against Soviet Russia. Are the Soviet people your enemy? No!... Hitler is the enemy of the German people...]. Photomontage: Hitler himself is digging the graves for his soldiers.

did.unittitle: Ein Appell deutscher Soldaten Deutsche...

scopecontent.p: 17x25 cm - 2 - preservation: 2, weathered. Description: the leaflet is a first attempt by the Soviet government to build an anti-Nazi organization among German prisoners of war in Soviet custody. [Appeal of German soldiers... Since Hitler achieved power the German people have had to keep silent. Only now, in Russian captivity, German soldiers are able to say openly what they think. Initiated by an antifascist prisoner of war, a meeting in camp 58 took place on 8th to 10th October... 158 soldiers from different sections of life participated... The German people does not have to rule foreign countries but it should be ruling its own country.]

did.unittitle: DER WEG ZUM FRIEDEN UND ZUR RÜCKKEHR IN DIE HEIMAT...

scopecontent.p: 16x26 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [The way to peace and to returning home... You have the weapons in your hands...]. Photomontage: dead German soldier and tank in snow. Photograph: German prisoners of war at work.

did.unittitle: Wie ist dem Krieg ein Ende zu...

scopecontent.p: 14x21cm - 2 - preservation: 1, punch holes, no loss of text. Description, see also above leaflet code 463: [How to make an end to this war...The appeal was signed by 158 soldiers from different sections of life...]. Photomontage: German prisoners of war sign the appeal of the "158."

did.unittitle: SEIDE UND LÄUSE...

scopecontent.p: 13x22 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1, punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [Silk and lice. In every German town women can now be seen, their eyes red with tears their husbands have been killed in front of Moscow, Leningrad or Rostov. They also dream of ham, a fur coat, silk stockings. Only lice eat from your frozen bodies...]. The author of the text was Ilia Erenburg.

did.unittitle: Was geht in Deutschland vor? Nr. 35

scopecontent.p: 14x21 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [What is happening in Germany? No. 35. Goebbels is talking about a possible defeat of Germany... Nazi lies to intimidate the people. The Nazi-press is spreading the lie that the enemies of Germany are intending to sterilize all German men... Hitler began his rule by sterilization of the Jews...]

did.unittitle: Nachrichten von der Front Nr. 39

scopecontent.p: 15x23 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description of leaflet newspaper: [News from the Front No. 39... The German Wehrmacht has lost 6 million men... Big English offensive in Libya... The Russian winter is just beginning... The dead bodies of frozen German soldiers...]

did.unittitle: Auslands-Nachrichten Nr. 43

scopecontent.p: 14x21 cm - 2 - paper: red - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description of leaflet newspaper [News from foreign countries No. 43: The USA has abolished the neutrality act... The USA will transport war material under armed protection to ports of countries fighting against Hitler-Germany... American troops in Dutch Guyana...]

did.unittitle: DEUTSCHER SOLDAT, DER RUSSISCHE WINTER IST DEIN TOD...

scopecontent.p: 13x23 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1. Description: [German soldier, the Russian winter will be your death... Nothing but cold and death...] Photomontage

did.unittitle: Das deutsche Nachrichtenbüro über den Verlust von Rostow...

scopecontent.p: 13x20 cm - 2 - paper: green - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [The German news-agency on the loss of Rostov... Lies have short legs...]

did.unittitle: Kameraden der 23. Infanterie-Division! Als in der Nacht zum 30. August...

scopecontent.p: 13x20 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [Comrades of the 23rd Infantry Division!... Why should I as a worker kill other workers?...]

did.unittitle: Kameraden an der Front! Zu Euch spricht...

scopecontent.p: 13x20 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1. Description: a German POW is describing life in Soviet captivity. [Comrades at the front!..]

did.unittitle: IN DEN KÄMPFEN VOR MOSKAU...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - green - preservation: 1, punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [During the fighting in front of Moscow already 600,000 Germans have lost their lives... Hitler demanded in one of his orders that Moscow should be captured at any price... The Russians will not give up Moscow at any price... Soldier do not shoot at Russian soldiers!...].

did.unittitle: MIT HITLER WIRD NIEMAND FRIEDEN...

scopecontent.p: 14x22 cm - 2 - green- preservation: 1. Description: [Nobody will make peace with Hitler... Hitler and his clique have shown themselves as Imperialists...]

did.unittitle: Nachrichten von der Front Nr. 42

scopecontent.p: 15x24 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [News from the From No. 42... Panic-like retreat of Germans in the South... The USA are producing weapons for the war in the air...]. Caption of photograph: [One of the many American airplanes in Soviet Russia]

did.unittitle: Auslands-Nachrichten Nr. 44

scopecontent.p: 12x17 cm - 4 - green - preservation: 1, punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [News from Foreign Countries No. 44. Newspapers on the occupation of Rostov on Don by the Red Army... New York Times: "a brilliant Russian battle"... The German robbers will be dispersed and annihilated...].

did.unittitle: Nachrichten von der Front Nr. 43

scopecontent.p: 15x23 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [News from the Front No. 43… Booty of the Soviet-Army in the South... Heavy attacks of the English Air Force on Hamburg and Emden…A German pilot to his comrades...]

did.unittitle: Was geht in Deutschland vor? Nr. 37

scopecontent.p: 15x22 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1. Description of leaflet newspaper: [What is happening in Germany? No. 37... Quarrels among Nazi big shots...German peasants do not need foreign living space...Do not shoot at Red Army soldiers...]

did.unittitle: "Wann wirst Du wieder bei uns sein?"

scopecontent.p: 15x22 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text - description: Soviet leaflet propaganda for Christmas campaign. [''When will you be with us again?"... He was expected at home at Christmas. Dead lies Sergeant S. on the white cold snow of Russia...]

did.unittitle: Was tut Ihr? Gegen wen kämpft Ihr?...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - paper: red - preservation: 1 - description: [What are you doing? Against whom do you fight? German workers in soldier's uniform!... You are fighting against battalions of workers who have exchanged hammers for rifles... What are you doing? Where is your conscience as workers?...]

did.unittitle: Der Herr des Hauses hat das Recht, den Raüber,...

scopecontent.p: 13x20 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1. description: [The master of the house is allowed to destroy the robber who is entering his house with a weapon in his hands...]. The German radio reported Russian civilians greeted German soldiers with tears of joy but the Germans came to kill and rape girls and women... The author of this leaflet was Ilia Erenburg.

did.unittitle: Deutsche Frauen und Mädchen! Weihnachten ist das Fest der Liebe…

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - paper: brown - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [German women and girls! For two and a half years you have been waiting for your loved ones whom Hitler had sent to fight the war. This is your third "waiting-winter"... Christmas is the festivity of love. But it is not love, it is glowing hatred Hitler's soldiers are spreading whereever they are...]

did.unittitle: Deklaration der Regierung der Sowjetunion…

scopecontent.p: 15x22 cm - 2 - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [Declaration of the Soviet and Polish government on friendship and mutual help...]. The text of the declaration signed by Sikorski is reproduced on the reverse.

did.unittitle: TOD ODER GEFANGENSCHAFT. An die Soldaten der deutschen Truppen...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - paper: yellow - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [Death or captivity. To the soldiers of the German troops in the town of Kalinin... The roads of retreat for German troops have been cut. You can choose, death or captivity...].

did.unittitle: Ratschläge an die deutschen Soldaten. EIN GESCHEITER BURSCH...

scopecontent.p: 14x21 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: the leaflet contains advice for malingering. [Advice for German soldiers. A smart man will always find a way to help himself...Soldiers! Every day death is demanding more and more lives from your ranks... You want to save your lives but you don't know how to achieve it. Listen to our advice and you will stay alive. There are ways to safety... He who surrenders on his free will will be welcomed as a brother...]. (Code 558 on the leaflet is erroneous)

did.unittitle: Auslands-Nachrichten Nr. 45

scopecontent.p: 14x21 cm - 2 - paper: red - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description of leaflet newspaper: [News from Foreign Countries No. 45... The foreign press on the war at the Eastern Front... Hitler has the same fate as Napoleon in store for him... German soldiers withdrawing from Moscow are saying with macabre humor "Goodbye Moscow forever, down with Hitler!"]. The catchword [Goodbye Moscow] was ordered to be used until spring 1942. The Soviet general responsible for the production of leaflets insisted on using this slogan intensively. At that time German soldiers in general would not accept "Auf Nimmerwiedersehen Moskau! Nieder mit Hitler!"

did.unittitle: Auslands-Nachrichten Nr. 46

scopecontent.p: 15x22 cm - 2 - paper: red - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description of leaflet newspaper: [News from Foreign Countries No. 46. Cowardly attack of Japan on the USA and England. At dawn of December 7, Japanese airplanes attacked Hawaii... Roosevelt is addressing the Congress... A speech by Churchill]

did.unittitle: An die deutschen Soldaten der Moskauer Front...

scopecontent.p: 15x21 cm - 2 - paper: red - preservation: 1, two punch holes, no loss of text. Description: [To the German soldiers of the Moscow Front. The Red Army has taken the town of Tikhvin... The Germans are retreating from Moscow...].

did.unittitle: Hitler führt Deutschland den Weg Wilhelms II...

scopecontent.p: 13x21 cm - 2 - red - preservation: 1. Description: [Hitler is leading Germany the way of Wilhelm II. The war is only beginning but already the power and reserves of Hitler's army are dwindling... The families of soldiers are subjected virtually to hunger]

did.unittitle: Die Gauner und Falschspieler von der Spielhölle "Hitler...

scopecontent.p: 11x16 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [General Fieldmarshal Paulus is showing the German people the way!... All of you have this question burning in your hearts: What is the way out of this war Hitler has lost, what is the salvage?... Nazi-propagandists want to frighten you with the terror of defeat... Paulus says:... There is only one way out... Parting from Hitler and ending the war!...]. Portrait photograph of Paulus, see also leaflet code 3200.

did.unittitle: Schauermärchen der Hitlerfaschisten über angebliche Greueltaten der Sowjettruppen...

scopecontent.p: 9x17 cm - 2 - paper: rose - preservation: 1. Description: [Hitler Fascists spread alleged horror stories of war crimes committed by Soviet troops... Hitler Fascists intend to incite soldiers and civilians to continue the war... Nobody will believe Hitler's henchmen from Katyn, Babi-Yar and Maidanek...]. The leaflet is reporting on a film project Hitler-Fascists are producing. The title is "Greueltaten der Sowjettruppen in Ostpreussen" [Atrocities of Soviet troops in East Prussia]

did.unittitle: Der 27. Jahrestag der Grossen Sozialistischen Oktoberrevolution...

scopecontent.p: 20x25 cm - 8 - preservation: 1. Description: Stalin's report on the occasion of the 27th anniversary of the Russian Revolution... [On the fortification and enlargement of the anti-German coalition. Questions of peace and security...]

did.unittitle: Öffentliche Erklärung deutscher Generale...

scopecontent.p: 15x21 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Public declaration of German generals and officers about living conditions of German POWs in Soviet Russia. Because the German government is refusing to accept mail from German POWs in Russia, it is erecting an artificial wall between POWs and their relatives. Everything said in Germany about alleged mistreatment of German POWs is a lie...]

did.unittitle: Das Jahr ununterbrochener Niederlagen...

scopecontent.p: 11x15 cm - 4 - paper: red, paper: rose - preservation: 1. Description: [The year of Hitler's unrelenting defeats...]. Quotes of passages of Stalin's report on the occasion of the 27th anniversary of the Russian Revolution.

did.unittitle: Hitlerdeutschland von zwei Fronten umklammert Deutsche Offiziere und Soldaten!

scopecontent.p: 17x13 cm - 2 - paper: blue, rose - preservation: 1. Description: [Hitler-Germany encircled on two fronts...]. Quotes of passages of Stalin's report on the occasion of the 27th anniversary of the Russian Revolution.

did.unittitle: Hitlers letzte Karte ist geschlagen Deutsche Offiziere und Soldaten! Alle...

scopecontent.p: 17x13 cm - 2 - paper: rose - preservation: 1. Description: [Hitler played his last card...]. Quotes of passages of Stalin's report on the occasion of the 27th anniversary of the Russian revolution.

did.unittitle: Die Hitlerclique hat alle Völker der Welt gegen Deutschland aufgebracht...

scopecontent.p: 17x12 cm - 2 - paper: red, paper: rose - preservation: 1. Description: [Hitler's clique mobilized all nations of this world against Germany…]. Quotes of passages of Stalin's report on the occasion of the 27th anniversary of the Russian Revolution.

did.unittitle: Die Tage des Hitlerschen Blutregimes sind gezählt. Deutsche Offiziere und Soldaten! Hitlers...

scopecontent.p: 14x11 cm - 2 - paper: red, paper: rose - preservation: 1. Description: [The days of Hitler's blood regime are numbered...]. Quotes of passages of Stalin's report on the occasion of the 27th anniversary of the Russian Revolution.

did.unittitle: Worauf hofft Ihr noch?

scopecontent.p: 13x18 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [What is it you are hoping for? To incite you to spend your blood uselessly Nazi propaganda is raising false hopes. See the value of these hopes yourself. Volkssturm?... Wonder weapons?... Insurmountable walls?... Quarrels among the Allies?... Remember: Only he can save himself who ceases to believe in Hitler, he who is breaking with Hilter]

did.unittitle: DEUTSCHE GENERALE ÜBER DIE RUSSISCHE KRIEGSGEFANGENS

scopecontent.p: 13x19 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [German generals on Russian captivity... Draw your own conclusions from what your generals in Russian captivity tell you. Follow their call!...]

did.unittitle: Grüsse aus russischer Kriegsgefangenschaft... ihre Angehörigen in Berlin...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Greetings from Russian captivity... for relatives living in the city of Berlin... Try to get our lists of POWs! Inform the relatives of POWs!]. These lists of German POWs consist of about 70 names and addresses of relatives of POWs.

did.unittitle: TEHERAN UND SEINE FOLGEN Was wurde in Teheran beschlossen?...

scopecontent.p: 19x13 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Teheran and its results. Which decisions had been reached in Teheran?...]. Two maps of Germany.

did.unittitle: An Volk und Wehrmacht Moskau, 8. 12. 1944. Deutsche! Aus tiefer Sorge...

scopecontent.p: 17x25 cm - 4 - preservation: 1. Description: [To the people and Wehrmacht. Moscow, 8.12.1944...]. Declaration of German generals in Russian captivity. Typewritten text. Facsimiles of signatures.

did.unittitle: An Volk und Wehrmacht Moskau, 8. 12. 1944. Deutsche! Aus tiefer Sorge...

scopecontent.p: As above, but 2 pages, different layout and photograph instead of facsimiles.

did.unittitle: Generalsworte, die in Erfüllung gingen Offiziere und Soldaten! Im Juli...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Words of generals that came true...]. The leaflet compares words of German generals from July 1944 with the military situation at the end of 1944.

did.unittitle: Soldat! Du willst wissen; Zu welchem Zweck hat Hitler den Krieg...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Soldier! You want to know: 1. For what reason Hitler began the war? 2. Is there a slightest sign of hope Hitler can escape defeat? 3. Why does Hitler continue the lost war? 4. Will Germany perish if it ends the lost war? 5. What is the way out?...]

did.unittitle: Volkssturmmänner! Viele von Euren Kameraden sind schon nicht mehr am...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1 - 1.1945 - description: [Men of the Volkssturm! Many of your comrades are already dead. Thousands of German Volkssturm men perish uselessly every day...]

did.unittitle: An die Offiziere und Unteroffiziere der deutschen Wehrmacht...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [To the officers and non-commissioned officers of the German Wehrmacht... It would be ridiculous to ignore the enormous superiority of the Red Army and the complete impotence of the German Wehrmacht... Capitulation and imprisonment! There is no other way!...]

did.unittitle: Rette Dich, ehe es zu spät ist! Soldat! Von der Wolga his zur Oder sind es...

scopecontent.p: 10x15 cm - 2 - paper: yellow - preservation: 1. Description: [Save yourself before it will be too late! The distance from the river Volga to the river Oder is 2000 kilometers, from the Oder to Berlin 75 ... The Red Army has occupied all fortifications... and crossed the Oder river, she will also occupy the last fortification: Berlin... Don't wait until the Russians, British and Americans have destroyed the last pocket...]

did.unittitle: Soldat! WEISST DU schon etwas über die Krim-Konferenz? Anfang Februar...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [...What do you know about the Crimea-Conference?... Do you know what was decided at the Crimea-Conference about Germany and the German people?... Soldier, have you thought what your fate will be?...]

did.unittitle: Aus ist es mit allen Illusionen! Soldat! VOR KURZEM NOCH fütterten...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Not long ago the Nazis told you the illusion about alleged discrepancies among the Allies. Now these illusions have vanished...]

did.unittitle: Hitler ist Dein Feind! Mach Dich los von ihm! Soldat! Hitler ist Dein Feind...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Hitler is your enemy! Free yourself from him!... He has brought the war to the heart of Germany... He has torn you from your family...]

did.unittitle: BLICK AUF DIE KARTE! SIE HAT DIR VIEL ZU SAGEN, SOLDAT!...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Have a look at this map! It will tell you a lot, soldier! One month of the unchecked offensive of the Red Army..]. Map: frontline 12 January to 12 February 1945.

did.unittitle: ERKLÄRUNG DER FÜHRER DER DREI VERBÜNDETEN MÄCHTE...

scopecontent.p: 14x21 cm - 2 - paper: blue, red - preservation: 1. Description: [Declaration of the three leaders of the United Nations. In the first half of February a conference took place in the Crimea... Cease resistance... Any other way will lead to your extinction.]

did.unittitle: Die Russen im Vorgelände von Berlin. DEUTSCHE OFFIZIERE UND...

scopecontent.p: 14x21 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Russians are approaching Berlin. German officers and soldiers! You all should know what the Supreme Commander of the Red Army, Marshal Stalin, said on February 25, 1945... We have made our way to the approaches to Berlin... The complete victory over the Germans is quite near... Lay down your weapons and go together into captivity. This is the only way to your safety!...]

did.unittitle: Wir haben die Kriegspläne der...

scopecontent.p: 10x14 cm - 2 - paper: blue, red - preservation: 2, crinkled, discolored. Description: [''We have agreed on the war plans for the final destruction of the common enemy..."]. Quote from the declaration of the Crimea conference.

did.unittitle: Zu unseren Zielen gehört nicht die...

scopecontent.p: 10x14 cm - 2 - paper: blue, red - preservation: 1. Description: ["It is not our aim to annihilate the German people. Our irrevocable aim is to annihilate German militarism and Nazism and guarantee that Germany will never again be able to disturb the peace of the World"...]

did.unittitle: Denk an Deine Familie! Soldat! Jetzt...

scopecontent.p: 15x23 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Think about your family! Soldier! Now your wife and your child are at risk. Where are they today?... Who is responsible for their suffering? Hitler!...]

did.unittitle: DER STAND DER FRONTEN Zur Zeit der Teheraner Konferenz...

scopecontent.p: 20x14 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [The situation at the fronts. At the time of the Teheran Conference. At the time of the Crimea Conference]

did.unittitle: UNNÜTZE HOFFNUNGEN!...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Hopes are in vain! Unnecessary dread! Soldier! Hitler's war is lost without hope. You see that yourself. Why do you continue your resistance?... Unnecessary dread: the German people will not be annihilated. Only Nazism and the German militarism will be annihilated... Think about it: Time is running out! The Russians are at the doors of Berlin...]

did.unittitle: Die Russen im Vorgelände von Berlin... Stalin über die Ergebnisse des...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Russians in the approaches to Berlin...], see also leaflet 3310, different layout.

did.unittitle: Kapitulation der einzige Weg zur Rettung! Soldaten! Wenn ihr noch nicht...

scopecontent.p: 14x20 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Capitulation, the only way to safety! Soldiers!... Force your officers to capitulate immediately or discuss captivity among fellow soldiers...]

did.unittitle: Was sagen Eure Generale über die russische Kriegsgefangenschaft?...

scopecontent.p: 30x22 cm - 2 - brown - preservation: 2, edge damaged, no loss of text. Description: [What do your generals say about Russian captivity?...] Eight photographs of generals in Russian captivity.

did.unittitle: Organisierte Kapitulation Eure Rettung...

scopecontent.p: 15x23 cm - 2 - preservation: 1. Description: [Organized capitulation is your safety...]. Photograph of German POWs after the capitulation of Bunzlau garrison.

did.unittitle: Volkssturmmänner! Tausende deutscher Volkssturmmänner, alt und jung, gehen täglich...

scopecontent.p: 15x23 cm - 2 - preservation: 1 - paper: rose - description: [Men of the Volkssturm! Thousands of German men of the Volkssturm, old and young, perish every day senselessly... What is the use of all the the Nazis tell you, you are defending Germany. This is a lie! It is too late now to defend Germany... The Nazis tell you, the Allies would annihilate the German people. This is also a lie!... The Nazis tell you, you are defending your future. This is also a lie!... Today it is possible tomorrow it might be too late!...]. Photograph of Volkssturm men in Russian captivity.

did.unittitle: Die Wahrheit über die Lage in den von der Roten Armee besetzten...

scopecontent.p: 15x22 cm - 2 - preservation: 2, folded worn. Description: [The truth about the situation in the areas occupied by the Russian Army... The Hitler propaganda started an intensive hate campaign for the dissemination of lies about the conduct of the Russian Army in occupied German areas... What is really happening in German towns and villages occupied by the Red Army?...]

did.unittitle: 1945 Weg mit dem Bankrotteur! Deutsche! HITLER IST EUER FEIND!...

scopecontent.p: 15x21 cm - 2 - brown - preservation: 1. Description: [1945 - Away with the defaulter! Germans! Hitler is your enemy... Hitler's days and the days of his Nazi-clique are numbered... Cease all resistance against the Red Army! This will help to better the situation for you and your home country...]
